description: This trail offers all types of riding in different sections, some tech rocks, flowy downhills, super tight twists. There are no stunts, but super fun trails. This is only the upper section, 3 Stages is in three stages, two more sections to ride, can turn into 6 hrs of riding.
directions: From Blue Mt. Ski Resort, go south on CR19 for apprx 1km, follow it right on Osler Bluff for 2km, back right onto CR19 for 2km (well marked), left on CR2 (gravel rd.) follow CR2 up the gravel winding rd for 1.5km and park in lot at top of Rd. The Trail head is here.
title: 3 Stages (Upper Stage)
